# init(frame:)

**Initializer**

Creates an alert view with the specified frame.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(frame: CGRect)
```

## Creating alert views

- **init(title:message:delegate:cancelButtonTitle:)**: Convenience method for initializing an alert view.
- **init(title:message:delegate:cancelButtonTitle:otherButtonTitles:_:)**: Creates an alert view with the specified values.
- **init(coder:)**: Creates an alert view from data in an unarchiver.
